ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: who has amassed wealth and hoarded it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who amasses wealth and hordes it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who amasses wealth and counts it over and again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Who accumulated wealth and hoarded it, counting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who has gathered wealth and counted it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who amasses wealth and considers it a provision (against mishap);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who has gathered riches and counted them over
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who hath gathered wealth (of this world) and arranged it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who amasses wealth, counting it over,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who amasseth wealth; and counteth it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who amasses wealth and counts it over.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who pileth up wealth and layeth it by,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who has gathered wealth and counted it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who amasses wealth and counts it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Who gathers wealth and counts it over.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [104:2] who amasses (read jama‘a or jamma‘a) wealth and counts it over, keeping count of it and stores it aside as a provision against the [unforeseeable] calamities of time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who hath gathered wealth (of this world) and arranged it) and counted it; and it is also said: counted his 772 camels.
